name: Burst of Force
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Psychic Anthology © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text: With a burst of telekinetic force, you deal 1d6 points of force damage per caster level (maximum 15d6 points of damage) to all other creatures in the affected area. A successful Fortitude save reduces the damage taken by half. A creature that fails its Fortitude save must also succeed at a Reflex save or be knocked prone.
savingThrow_zh: 强韧，通过则减半（见描述）
text_zh: 通过爆发式的念动力场，你对其他所有影响范围内的生物造成每施法者等级1d6点力场伤害（最大15d6点伤害）。通过成功的强韧豁免将伤害减半。在这个强韧豁免中失败的生物必须再通过一次强韧豁免，否则会被击倒在地。
